text: In this study we analyzed the <extra_id_0> T cell receptor(TcR) delta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcripts expressed by <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - <extra_id_0> CD16 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + cells and we investigated whether these cells expressed the <extra_id_0> hGATA-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> T cell transcription factor and the <extra_id_0> recombination-activating gene (RAG)-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

text: Multiple <extra_id_0> TcR delta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcripts deriving from an unrearranged <extra_id_0> TcR delta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene were detected in both polyclonal and clonal <extra_id_0> CD3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - <extra_id_0> CD16 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + natural killer ( NK ) cell lines .

Two unrearranged <extra_id_0> TcR delta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> transcripts had a size similar to that of the functional <extra_id_0> TcR delta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA ( 2.3 and 1.3 kb ) found in <extra_id_0> TcR gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> delta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T lymphocytes .

Sequence analysis of nine different 2.3-kb cDNA clones obtained from NK - derived polyA+ RNA confirmed that they corresponded to an unrearranged <extra_id_0> TcR delta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> gene .
These cDNA were 2343 bp long and their transcription initiation site was located 814 bp upstream from the J delta 1 segment .
The sequence located upstream of the J delta 1 segment corresponded to the previously reported germ-line sequence .
The J delta 1 segment was correctly spliced to C delta ; in addition the four C delta exons were found to be already assembled .
Two polyadenylation sites were present in the fourth C delta exon .
However , only that located at the 3 ' end appeared to be utilized in the 2.3-kb cDNA .

The expression of <extra_id_0> hGATA-3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , a T cell - specific factor known to be involved in the regulation of the transcription of <extra_id_0> TcR delta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> locus , was analyzed by Northern blot , in cultured NK cell population and clones ( but not in freshly derived cell populations ) .
